column2: Sihnaoukville: Nine more Chinese men were deported from Sihanoukvile airport at 6.50 pm on August 13.------They were the latest of a large group who were detained for drug offenses in July. They were also barred from entering Cambodia for 3 years.------11 were sent away------ on Sunday and ------13 others last ------Thursday.------Source: General Department of Immigration
